discussion_comments.comment_body:
My reason for enabling [`composite`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig/#composite) is that enforces some constraints that make `tsc --build` run faster when there are no changes.

I enabled [`isolatedModules`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig/#isolatedModules) because it enables some checks that ensure that each file can be transpiled independently. It's my understanding that this should be used if the code is expected to be used from transpilers or bundlers like babel or esbuild.
